p: The obtained compound 320 was evaluated for its cytotoxic activities against A549 human lung cancer cells and HepG2 human liver cancer cells. Compound 320 exhibited potent cytotoxic activities towards A549 human lung cancer cells and HepG2 human liver cancer cells with IC 50 values of 23.73 ± 3.61 µM and 35.73 ± 2.15 µM, respectively [ 90].
